title: Federal-State Relationship: Cooperative Federalism and Its Discontents
prompt: An overhead shot of a rural county administrative building's conference table scattered with federal compliance documents, state implementation plans, and budget spreadsheets in morning light from tall windows, with hands of two people (one holding a pen, one gesturing) visible across the table in soft focus, conveying bureaucratic weight and competing interests without showing facesâ€”the composition emphasizes the physical layers of paperwork between them, with muted grays and warm wood tones, shot in documentary style to capture the quiet tension of divided authority and high-stakes negotiation.
